name: promptcode-cli
description: CLI tool for PromptCode - Generate AI-ready prompts from codebases

scripts.build: node scripts/inject-version.js && npm run typecheck && node scripts/generate-checksums.js && node scripts/embed-templates.js && bun build src/index.ts --compile --target=bun --outfile dist/promptcode && npm run copy-templates
scripts.copy-templates: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); fs.cpSync('src/claude-templates', 'dist/claude-templates', {recursive:true}); fs.cpSync('src/cursor-templates', 'dist/cursor-templates', {recursive:true})"
